Html:
When creating CoffeeScript files; is there a way to configure Chirpy so that I change the file naming convention from myfilename.chirp.coffee to just myfilename.coffee?  

Best regards,

Chris

Yes, in config screen.

In visual studio menu tools

Item options

Node Chirpy

Node CoffeeScript

Hi,
Thank you! I tried that and it doesn't seem to be working. I can change the default for LESS files, but not coffeescript. I think a bug exists, unless someone else can change the default for coffeescript. I really do appreciate all you've done to make this tool possible for others.

Best regards,
Chris

Sent from my iPad
